content: CTO: Review API provider options and select elite stack
LLM SME: Research Adobe Firefly API capabilities, pricing, and best practices
LLM SME: Research Photoshop API capabilities and integration patterns
LLM SME: Research elite API alternatives (Replicate, FLUX, SDXL)
Backend SME: Build ReplicateImageGeneratorTool with FLUX Pro and SDXL
Infrastructure SME: Set up Replicate account and test FLUX Pro
Backend SME: Build intelligent router (Replicate primary, Firefly backup)
Backend SME: Create Social Media Agent with smart routing
Infrastructure SME: Adobe Developer Console setup (optional backup)
Backend SME: Build FireflyImageGeneratorTool (optional legal fallback)
Backend SME: Write tests and documentation
Tech Sonar: Register Replicate and Adobe APIs for monitoring
CTO: Review implementation and approve for production
